name: Chrometranslate
body:
Installation

1. [Download crx](https://github.com/papplampe/chrometranslate/raw/master/dist/chrometranslate.crx)
2. make new tab with chrome://extensions/
3. drag and drop the crx into it


![alt screenshot](https://raw2.github.com/papplampe/chrometranslate/master/screenshot/screenshot.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
